sentence.Network_en: He is as slippery as an eel and simply refuses to be pinned down on anything.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很圆滑,什么事情都不肯承担责任.

sentence.Network_en: She's as slippery as an eel.
'I'm Ben Gunn, I am,'replied the maroon, wriggling like an eel in his embarrassment.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 是的, 我是本-刚恩, ”这位放逐在荒滩上的水手答道, 一面不好意思地像鳗鱼一样扭动着身子.
